channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Official Integration for Billingo
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Official Integration for Billingo

item.title: CVE-2022-3420|2024-08-03T01:07:06.587Z -- unknown -- official%20integration%20for%20billingo
item.description: The Official Integration for Billingo WordPress plugin before 3.4.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users with a role as low as Shop Manager to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks.
